legal_basis: RPD's decisions on evidence and credibility are reviewed for reasonableness
internal_flight_alternative: An IFA exists if there is no serious possibility of persecution in another part of the country and it is reasonable to expect the claimant to relocate
credibility_findings: The RPD found insufficient evidence of credible threats against the applicants outside their home area
risk_of_persecution: Applicants claimed fear of persecution due to political activities
decision_outcome: Application dismissed; no error found in RPD's decision regarding fear of persecution or IFA
